title: Jobs We Do at School
description: Students love to help out by having a job in their classroom. Jobs We Do at School explains different jobs students can have in a classroom with simple sentences and helpful photographs. Emergent readers can use the pictures and prior knowledge of the subject to decode the text. The book can also be used to teach students about main idea and supporting details as well as locating and using verbs.
meta: collector, jobs, leader, pass, saver, students

Main Idea and Details : Identify main idea and details in a text
